Package soot.jimple.infoflow.solver

Interface IInfoflowSolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InfoflowSolver, InfoflowSolver, InfoflowSolver, InfoflowSolver, SparseInfoflowSolver
    public interface IInfoflowSolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void applySummary​(soot.SootMethod callee, Abstraction d3, soot.Unit callSite, Abstraction d2, Abstraction d1)
      Calls applyEndSummaryOnCall in the current solver
      void cleanup()
      Cleans up some unused memory.
      Set<EndSummary<soot.Unit,​Abstraction>> endSummary​(soot.SootMethod m, Abstraction d3)
      Gets the end summary of the given method for the given incoming abstraction
      IMemoryManager<Abstraction,​soot.Unit> getMemoryManager()
      Gets the memory manager used by this solver to reduce memory consumption
      long getPropagationCount()
      Gets the number of edges propagated by the solver
      AbstractInfoflowProblem getTabulationProblem()
      Gets the IFDS problem solved by this solver
      void injectContext​(IInfoflowSolver otherSolver, soot.SootMethod callee, Abstraction d3, soot.Unit callSite, Abstraction d2, Abstraction d1)
      Injects the given calling context into the incoming set
      boolean processEdge​(heros.solver.PathEdge<soot.Unit,​Abstraction> edge)
      Schedules the given edge for processing in the solver
      void setFollowReturnsPastSeedsHandler​(IFollowReturnsPastSeedsHandler handler)
      Sets a handler that will be called when a followReturnsPastSeeds case happens, i.e., a taint leaves a method for which we have not seen any callers
      void setMaxAbstractionPathLength​(int maxAbstractionPathLength)
      Sets the maximum length of a taint propagation path.
      void setMaxCalleesPerCallSite​(int maxCalleesPerCallSite)
      Sets the maximum number of callees that are allowed per call site.
      void setMaxJoinPointAbstractions​(int maxJoinPointAbstractions)
      Sets the maximum number of abstractions that shall be recorded per join point.
      void setMemoryManager​(IMemoryManager<Abstraction,​soot.Unit> memoryManager)
      Sets the memory manager that shall be used to manage the abstractions
      void setPeerGroup​(ISolverPeerGroup solverPeerGroup)
      Sets the peer group in which this solver operates.
      void setPredecessorShorteningMode​(PredecessorShorteningMode mode)
      Sets whether abstractions on method returns shall be connected to the respective call abstractions to shortcut paths.
      void setSolverId​(boolean solverId)  
      void solve()
      Solves the data flow problem
      void terminate()
      Notifies the solver that no further edges will be scheduled

    • Method Detail

      • processEdge

        boolean processEdge​(heros.solver.PathEdge<soot.Unit,​Abstraction> edge)
        Schedules the given edge for processing in the solver
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to schedule for processing
        Returns:
        True if the edge was scheduled, otherwise (e.g., if the edge has already been processed earlier) false

      • endSummary

        Set<EndSummary<soot.Unit,​Abstraction>> endSummary​(soot.SootMethod m,
                                                        Abstraction d3)
        Gets the end summary of the given method for the given incoming abstraction
        Parameters:
        m - The method for which to get the end summary
        d3 - The incoming fact (context) for which to get the end summary
        Returns:
        The end summary of the given method for the given incoming abstraction

      • injectContext

        void injectContext​(IInfoflowSolver otherSolver,
                   soot.SootMethod callee,
                   Abstraction d3,
                   soot.Unit callSite,
                   Abstraction d2,
                   Abstraction d1)
        Injects the given calling context into the incoming set
        Parameters:
        callee - method
        d3 - calling context
        callSite - call site
        d2 - incoming abstraction at the call site
        d1 - calling context at the call site

      • applySummary

        void applySummary​(soot.SootMethod callee,
                  Abstraction d3,
                  soot.Unit callSite,
                  Abstraction d2,
                  Abstraction d1)
        Calls applyEndSummaryOnCall in the current solver
        Parameters:
        callee - method
        d3 - calling context
        callSite - call site
        d2 - incoming abstraction at the call site
        d1 - calling context at the call site

      • cleanup

        void cleanup()
        Cleans up some unused memory. Results will still be available afterwards, but no intermediate computation values.

      • setFollowReturnsPastSeedsHandler

        void setFollowReturnsPastSeedsHandler​(IFollowReturnsPastSeedsHandler handler)
        Sets a handler that will be called when a followReturnsPastSeeds case happens, i.e., a taint leaves a method for which we have not seen any callers
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to be called when a followReturnsPastSeeds case happens

      • setMemoryManager

        void setMemoryManager​(IMemoryManager<Abstraction,​soot.Unit> memoryManager)
        Sets the memory manager that shall be used to manage the abstractions
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - The memory manager that shall be used to manage the abstractions

      • getMemoryManager

        IMemoryManager<Abstraction,​soot.Unit> getMemoryManager()
        Gets the memory manager used by this solver to reduce memory consumption
        Returns:
        The memory manager registered with this solver

      • setPredecessorShorteningMode

        void setPredecessorShorteningMode​(PredecessorShorteningMode mode)
        Sets whether abstractions on method returns shall be connected to the respective call abstractions to shortcut paths.
        Parameters:
        mode - The strategy to use for shortening predecessor paths

      • getPropagationCount

        long getPropagationCount()
        Gets the number of edges propagated by the solver
        Returns:
        The number of edges propagated by the solver

      • solve

        void solve()
        Solves the data flow problem

      • setSolverId

        void setSolverId​(boolean solverId)

      • getTabulationProblem

        AbstractInfoflowProblem getTabulationProblem()
        Gets the IFDS problem solved by this solver
        Returns:
        The IFDS problem solved by this solver

      • setMaxJoinPointAbstractions

        void setMaxJoinPointAbstractions​(int maxJoinPointAbstractions)
        Sets the maximum number of abstractions that shall be recorded per join point. In other words, enabling this option disables the recording of neighbors beyond the given count.
        Parameters:
        maxJoinPointAbstractions - The maximum number of abstractions per join point, or -1 to record an arbitrary number of join point abstractions

      • setMaxCalleesPerCallSite

        void setMaxCalleesPerCallSite​(int maxCalleesPerCallSite)
        Sets the maximum number of callees that are allowed per call site. If a call site has more than this number of callees, the call site is skipped and none of the callees are processed.
        Parameters:
        maxCalleesPerCallSite - The maximum number of callees per call site

      • setMaxAbstractionPathLength

        void setMaxAbstractionPathLength​(int maxAbstractionPathLength)
        Sets the maximum length of a taint propagation path. Abstractions that run beyond this limit are dropped.
        Parameters:
        maxAbstractionPathLength - The maximum number of abstractions on a propagation path

      • setPeerGroup

        void setPeerGroup​(ISolverPeerGroup solverPeerGroup)
        Sets the peer group in which this solver operates. Peer groups allow for synchronization between solvers
        Parameters:
        solverPeerGroup - The solver peer group

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        Notifies the solver that no further edges will be scheduled
